content:
Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 19}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a spruce_boat, I first need to craft 2 spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted from spruce_logs, so I will start by moving 1 spruce_log from slot 18 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 19}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}]
thought: The spruce_log has now been crafted into spruce_planks, so I will move them out of the crafting grid and into my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 19}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a spruce_boat I need to craft some spruce_planks, which requires placing a spruce_log in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the spruce_log at slot 18 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 19}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the spruce_planks, I will move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 40, "index": 19}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 30}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 32}, {"type": "black_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 46, "index": 37}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 51, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a spruce boat, I need to place three spruce planks in a U-shape in the crafting grid. The first plank should be placed in the top left corner, so I will move one plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
